mediaUploader.imageDescription: Drag and drop your images here, or click to browse. Recommended: JPG, PNG (max 5MB each).
mediaUploader.dragDropImages: Drag and drop images here, or click to upload
mediaUploader.videoDescription: Upload your event videos here. Recommended formats: MP4, MOV (max 10MB each).

eventTitle.eventSummary: A short and sweet sentence about your event
eventTitle.eventTitleDescription: Be clear and descriptive with a title that tells people what your event is about.
eventTitle.summaryDescription: Grab people's attention with a short description about your event. Attendees will see this at the top of your event page. (500 characters max)

dateAndTime.reserveSeatingAlert: Reserve seating is not available for recurring events.
dateAndTime.title: Date and Location
dateAndTime.recurringEventDescription: For timed entry and multiple days
dateAndTime.recurringEventInfo: Youâ€™ll be able to add dates and times in the next step.
dateAndTime.reservedSeatingDescription: Use your venue map to set price tiers for each section and choose whether attendees can pick their seat.
dateAndTime.verifyPhoneDescription: We'll send the phone number you enter a one-time verification code. This keeps Tixery a place to host real events.
dateAndTime.onlineEventInfo: Online events have unique event pages where you can add links to livestreams and more.
dateAndTime.displayEndTimeDescription: The time your event ends will appear on your event page

faqSection.title: Good to know
faqSection.description: Use this section to feature specific information about your event. Add highlights and frequently asked questions for attendees.
faqSection.subtitle: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.instructions: Answer questions your attendees may have about the event, like accessibility and amenities.

onlineEvent.title: Title
onlineEvent.attendeeEventPageDescription: Attendees will join your online event through your virtual venue. Use this space to add a live video or audio stream, share additional content, and customize the look of your event page.
onlineEvent.addLiveVideoAudioDescription: Add a live video or audio stream to your event. You can use any streaming service that provides a link to your stream.
onlineEvent.shareAdditionalContentDescription: Add additional content to your event. You can add files, links, and more.
onlineEvent.youtubeOnly: We currently support Youtube videos only
onlineEvent.notifyAttendees: Notify attendees when this is shown
onlineEvent.usingAttendeeEventPageDescription: We'll redirect your attendees to this page with automatic reminder emails and access instructions.

ticket.noMapsFound: No venue maps found for this address
ticket.createMapPrompt: Create a venue map to get started.

ticket.paidDescription: Sell tickets to your event and start making money.
ticket.donationDescription: Let attendees choose how much they want to pay for a ticket.
ticket.chooseTicketType: Choose a ticket type or build a section with multiple ticket types.
ticket.absorbFeesDescription: Absorb fees: Ticketing fees are deducted from your donation amount

ticketSection.eventCapacityDescription: Event capacity is the total number of tickets available for sale at your event. When you set an event capacity, your event will sell out as soon as you sell that number of total tickets. You can adjust your event capacity to prevent overselling.
ticketSection.eventCapacityTooltip: Event capacity is the total number of tickets available for sale at your event. When you set an event capacity, your event will sell out as soon as you sell that number of total tickets. You can adjust your event capacity to prevent overselling.

eventPublish.automateRefundsDescription: Automatically approve refund requests for orders of one ticket if the event balance can cover the request. If turned off, you must respond to all refund requests within five days.

community_guidelines_description: Our Community Guidelines describe the sort of content we prohibit. If you suspect an event may be in violation, you can report it to us so we can investigate.
contact_organizer_first: If you have a question about an event, need to resolve a dispute, or would like to request a refund, we encourage you to first contact the organizer directly.
imminent_danger_contact_law_enforcement: If you or someone else is in imminent danger as a result of an event listing, please contact your local law enforcement agency for assistance.
description_placeholder: Why do you believe this event listing is fraudulent or unauthorized? Please describe your relationship to the event...
report_submitted: Thank you for your report. We will investigate this event.

createEventWithAI.aiDescription: Answer a few questions about your event and our AI creation tool will use internal data to build an event page. You can still create an event without AI.
createEventWithAI.eventName: Whatâ€™s the name of your event?

createEventWithAI.capacityDescription: Event capacity is the total number of tickets you're willing to sell.
